problem.markdown:
>>Has ANC 1 had a consistent value from year-to-year and from month-to-month? (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. ANC 1 has been inconsistent from year-to-year and month-to-month. ( ) B. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in June and February. (x) C. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in May and January. ( ) D. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month.
[explanation] The values of ANC 1 have been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in May of last year and January of this year. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Has ANC 1 had a consistent value from year-to-year and from month-to-month? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. ANC 1 has been inconsistent from year-to-year and month-to-month.
B. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in June and February.
C. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in May and January.
D. ANC 1 has been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month.

div.p: The values of ANC 1 have been consistent from year-to-year and month-to-month, except for rises in May of last year and January of this year.
